summary.span: 显示一个复选框，允许用户选择 或 条件。

span.span: Displays a check box that allows the user to select a or condition.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主题内容：In this topic: - [介绍Introduction](#Introduction) - [声明性语法Declarative Syntax](#DeclarativeSyntax) ## 介绍Introduction 使用控件，以允许用户选择`true`或`false`状态。Use the control to allow the user to select a `true` or `false` state. 如果你打算使用多个控件，控件是其他控制，可提供方便的数据绑定功能。If you plan to use multiple controls, the control is an alternative control that provides convenient data binding capabilities. 但是，单个控件提供更好地控制布局。However, individual controls provide greater control over layout. > [!IMPORTANT] > 一个控件接受用户输入，这是潜在的安全威胁。A control accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 移动网页验证用户输入不包括脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET mobile Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). ## 声明性语法Declarative Syntax ``` ``` ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用控件以指示是否在总销售额的计算中包括税金。The following example demonstrates how to use a control to indicate whether tax is included in the calculation for a sales total. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单个文件代码模型，如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件可能无法正常运行。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空文本文件。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示在单击时 状态是否自动回发到服务器。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the state automatically posts back to the server when clicked.

value.span: 为 ，则在单击 控件时自动将其状态发送到服务器，否则为 。

span.span: to automatically post the state of the control to the server when it is clicked; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性用于指定是否的状态控件回发到服务器时单击。Use this property to specify whether the state of the control is posted back to the server when clicked. > [!NOTE] > 此属性设置为`true`导致到服务器的往返行程，每次单击该控件。Setting this property to `true` causes a round trip to the server every time the control is clicked. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅并[ASP.NET 主题和外观](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性来自动发布到的状态到服务器时单击该控件的控件。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to automatically post the state of the control to the server when the control is clicked. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单个文件代码模型，如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件可能无法正常运行。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空文本文件。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示当选中 控件时是否执行验证。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether validation is performed when the control is selected.

value.span: 如果在单击 时执行验证，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if validation is performed when the is clicked; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来确定是否在客户端和服务器上执行验证时控件处于选中状态。Use the property to determine whether validation is performed on both the client and the server when a control is selected. 页验证确定与所有页上的验证控件关联的输入的控件是否为指定的验证控件通过验证规则。Page validation determines whether the input controls that are associated with a validation control on the page all pass the validation rules as specified by the validation control. 默认情况下，单击控件不会导致页验证。By default, clicking a control does not cause page validation. 若要执行页验证时单击控件时，设置属性设置为`true`。To perform page validation when the control is clicked, set the property to `true`. 时的值属性设置为`true`，还可以使用属性来为其指定验证组的名称控件引发验证。When the value of the property is set to `true`, you can also use the property to specify the name of the validation group for which the control causes validation. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅并[ASP.NET 主题和外观](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性来确定是否控件处于选中状态。Use this property to determine whether the control is checked. 此外可以使用此属性以编程方式设置的状态控件。This property can also be used to programmatically set the state of the control. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅并[ASP.NET 主题和外观](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性来确定的状态控件。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to determine the state of the control. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单个文件代码模型，如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件可能无法正常运行。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空文本文件。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). summary.span: 属性的值在向服务器发送期间更改时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the value of the property changes between posts to the server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时的值的各次发送到服务器的属性更改。The event is raised when the value of the property changes between posts to the server. 此事件不将页面回发到服务器，除非属性设置为`true`。This event does not post the page back to the server unless the property is set to `true`. > [!NOTE] > 一个控件必须保留某些信息发往此事件，以便正常工作的服务器之间的值。A control must persist some values between posts to the server for this event to work correctly. 请确保此控件启用了视图状态。Be sure that view state is enabled for this control. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[如何： 使用 Web 窗体应用程序中的事件](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-consume-events-in-a-web-forms-application.md)。For more information about handling events, see [How to: Consume Events in a Web Forms Application](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-consume-events-in-a-web-forms-application.md). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何指定和编写代码的处理程序事件的控件。The following example demonstrates how to specify and code the handler for the event of a control. > [!NOTE] > 以下代码示例使用单个文件代码模型，且如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件可能无法正常运行。The following code samples use the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 每个代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空文本文件。Each code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). [!code-aspx-csharp[CheckBoxCheckedChanged#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CheckBoxCheckedChanged/CS/checkboxcheckedchangedcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CheckBoxCheckedChanged#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CheckBoxCheckedChanged/VB/checkboxcheckedchangedvb.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-csharp[CheckBoxCheckedChanged2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CheckBoxCheckedChanged2/CS/checkboxcheckedchanged2cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CheckBoxCheckedChanged2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CheckBoxCheckedChanged2/VB/checkboxcheckedchanged2vb.aspx#1)]

span.span: if the posted content is different from the last posting; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法主要由控件开发人员。The method is used primarily by control developers. 方法检查的回发数据控件是否不同于以前的值，以及如果是这样，加载该内容，并且返回`true`。The method checks if the postback data of the control is different from its previous value, and if so, loads the content and returns `true`.

span.span: An object that contains the saved view state values for the control.

summary.span: 加载以前保存的 控件的视图状态。

span.span: Loads the previously saved view state of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法主要由.NET Framework 基础结构并不应在代码中直接使用。This method is used primarily by the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code. 但是，控件开发人员可以重写此方法以指定自定义服务器控件还原其视图状态的方式。However, control developers can override this method to specify how a custom server control restores its view state. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 状态管理概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce)。For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce). 方法将还原的视图状态信息对象从保存的上一个页请求方法。The method restores view-state information for the object from a previous page request that was saved by the method.

summary.span: 引发 控件的 事件。

span.span: Raises the event of the control.

summary.span: 这使您可以直接处理该事件。

span.span: This allows you to handle the event directly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时的值的各次发送到服务器的属性更改。The event is raised when the value of the property changes between posts to the server. > [!NOTE] > 一个控件必须保留某些信息发往此事件，以便正常工作的服务器之间的值。A control must persist some values between posts to the server for this event to work correctly. 请确保此控件启用了视图状态。Be sure that view state is enabled for this control. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何： 使用 Web 窗体应用程序中的事件](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-consume-events-in-a-web-forms-application.md)For more information, see [How to: Consume Events in a Web Forms Application](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-consume-events-in-a-web-forms-application.md) 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何指定和编写代码的处理程序事件的控件。The following example demonstrates how to specify and code the handler for the event of a control. > [!NOTE] > 以下代码示例使用单个文件代码模型，且如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件可能无法正常运行。The following code samples use the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 每个代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空文本文件。Each code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). [!code-aspx-csharp[CheckBoxCheckedChanged#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CheckBoxCheckedChanged/CS/checkboxcheckedchangedcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CheckBoxCheckedChanged#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CheckBoxCheckedChanged/VB/checkboxcheckedchangedvb.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-csharp[CheckBoxCheckedChanged2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CheckBoxCheckedChanged2/CS/checkboxcheckedchanged2cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CheckBoxCheckedChanged2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CheckBoxCheckedChanged2/VB/checkboxcheckedchanged2vb.aspx#1)]

span.para: 重写时在派生类中，请务必调用基类的方法，以便已注册的委托接收事件。
When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

summary.span: 如果 控件的发送数据已更改，则调用 方法。

span.span: Invokes the method when the posted data for the control has changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法主要由控件开发人员。The method is used primarily by control developers. 方法将调用方法如果的发送的数据控制已更改。The method invokes the method if the posted data for the control has changed. 如果属性是`true`，在中设置的控件属性进行验证。If the property is `true`, the controls that are set in the property are validated.

summary.span: 在页回发到服务器后，将更改保存到 视图状态。

span.span: Saves the changes to the view state since the time the page was posted back to the server.

returns.span: 包含 的视图状态更改的对象；如果对象没有任何关联视图状态，则为 。

span.span: The object that contains the changes to the view state; otherwise, if no view state is associated with the object, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法主要由控件开发人员。The method is used primarily by control developers. 视图状态是累积的服务器控件的属性的值。View state is the accumulation of the values of a server control's properties. 这些值被自动放入服务器控件，这是实例属性的类。These values are automatically placed in the property for the server control, which is an instance of the class. 然后此属性的值保存到一个字符串对象后的服务器控件的生命周期的保存状态阶段中。This property's value is then persisted to a string object after the save-state stage of the server control's life cycle. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 页面生命周期概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7949d756-1a79-464e-891f-904b1cfc7991)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Page Life Cycle Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7949d756-1a79-464e-891f-904b1cfc7991). 保存视图状态时，此字符串对象返回到客户端为存储在隐藏的 HTML input 元素中的变量。When view state is saved, this string object is returned to the client as a variable that is stored in a hidden HTML input element. 如果您创作的自定义服务器控件，您可以通过重写提高效率和修改服务器控件的属性。When you author custom server controls, you can improve efficiency by overriding the and modifying the property for your server control. 有关详细信息，请参阅[开发自定义 ASP.NET 服务器控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fbe26c16-cff4-4089-b3dd-877411f0c0ef)并[ASP.NET 状态管理概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce)。For more information, see [Developing Custom ASP.NET Server Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fbe26c16-cff4-4089-b3dd-877411f0c0ef) and [ASP.NET State Management Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce).

summary.span: 获取或设置与 关联的文本标签。

span.span: Gets or sets the text label associated with the .

value.span: 与 关联的文本标签。

span.span: The text label associated with the .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性用于指定与关联的文本标签控件。Use this property to specify the text label associated with the control. 此外可以使用此属性以编程方式获取与关联的文本标签控件。This property can also be used to programmatically get the text label associated with the control. > [!CAUTION] > 此控件用于显示用户输入，这可能包括恶意客户端脚本。This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script. 检查从客户端的可执行脚本、 SQL 语句或其他代码之前发送应用程序中显示的任何信息。Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application. ASP.NET 提供了用户输入到脚本块和 HTML 的输入的请求验证功能。ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input. 验证服务器控件还提供用于评估用户输入。Validation server controls are also provided to assess user input. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何： 使用 Web 窗体应用程序中的事件](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-consume-events-in-a-web-forms-application.md)。For more information, see [How to: Consume Events in a Web Forms Application](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-consume-events-in-a-web-forms-application.md). 此属性的值设置时，可以自动保存到资源文件使用设计器工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息，请参阅并[全球化和本地化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性指定的文本标签关联控件。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the text label associated with the control. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单个文件代码模型，如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件可能无法正常运行。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空文本文件。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). summary.span: 获取或设置与 控件关联的文本标签的对齐方式。

span.span: Gets or sets the alignment of the text label associated with the control.
One of the values.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性指定的文本标签的对齐方式关联控件。Use this property to specify the alignment of the text label associated with the control. 您可以指定到右侧或左侧的复选框是否显示的文本标签。You can specify whether the text label appears to the right or left of the check box. 使用属性指定的标签文本。Use the property to specify the label text. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性右侧的复选框显示的文本标签。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to display the text label to the right of the check box. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单个文件代码模型，如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件可能无法正常运行。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空文本文件。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 会自动调用方法时控件进行初始化。ASP.NET automatically calls the method when the control is initialized.

summary.span: 获取或设置在 控件回发到服务器时导致验证的控件组。

span.span: Gets or sets the group of controls for which the control causes validation when it posts back to the server.

value.span: 在 控件回发到服务器时引发验证的控件组。

span.span: The group of controls for which the causes validation when it posts back to the server.
The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 验证组可以分配给特定类别的页面上的验证控件。Validation groups allow you to assign validation controls on a page to a specific category. 每个验证组可以独立于其他页上的验证组进行验证。Each validation group can be validated independently of other validation groups on the page. 使用属性指定的验证组的名称为其控件回发到服务器时导致验证。Use the property to specify the name of the validation group for which the control causes validation when it posts back to the server. 属性不起作用时，才的值属性设置为`true`。The property has an effect only when the value of the property is set to `true`. 指定的值时属性，只是指定组的一部分的验证控件的验证时控件回发到服务器。When you specify a value for the property, only the validation controls that are part of the specified group are validated when the control posts back to the server. 如果未指定的值并属性设置为`true`，页面上未分配给验证组的所有验证控件时该控件回发到服务器进行都验证。If you do not specify a value for the and the property is set to `true`, all validation controls on the page that are not assigned to a validation group are validated when the control posts back to the server. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅并[ASP.NET 主题和外观](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).
